attributes.action: ask him what he is actually doing to help the unemployed?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears not much from where i sit here...
Does he have a plan?
If so can he share it?
Retraining seems to be nonexistent. Why?

rejection.details: Please visit http://www.realhelpnow.gov.uk/ to find out what the Government is doing to help the unemployed.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
